title: Software Technical Writer and Knowledge Manager

subtitle.highlight: user help, admin docs, internal wikis

description: I help teams explain and document their products to provide easy self-service for customers, reduce support tickets, and create clarity for internal staff. I'm experienced in leading full documentation solutions, including setting up a knowledge base with the best tools for your environment, auditing content, and creating deliverables to fill the gaps - from process docs and online help to internal wikis and SOPs.
